questions.quote: Look. This plane is *full*. I got a lot of people to serve. Now please... You're just gonna have to wait.
Yeah. I mean, his upper lip landed flush on my upper lip. But his lower lip landed well below my rim.
Hey, let me ask you a question. In these nudist colonies, do they eat naked in the dining room?
But if we did that, we might feel a certain obligation to call.
Hold it. I really want to be clear about this. Are you talking about the woman in the meeting? Is that the woman you're talking about?
Ahh, you know what I think. I'm just going to have soup. Yeah, I'll save the meal for another time.
Well, I guess I have all the more reason to get back with her.
...you'll see, things will be different now - if you just give me one more chance.
Alright, Newman. What do I have to do to get you to stop pulling the strings for Kramer?
Because to pull rickshaws means more than just strong legs. You're also going to need a well-toned upper body.
